Fan.NAME: Fan
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play Sakura or Butterfly, If amount of same type greater than #b
, exhaust it. These cards avoid Reset while being exhausted.

Diaphaneity.NAME: Diaphaneity
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce damage taken #b
Increase damage taken #b
%. Reduce by half at start of turn.

Ghost.NAME: Phantom
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, cause HP loss to a random enemy of ' #bcount #bof #bremaining #bhand ' for #b
times. NL At the start of turn, give 1 #yConstricted to a random enemy and reduce by 1.

Nihility.NAME: Nihility
DESCRIPTIONS: Each card you play in this turn will give #b
Diaphaneity to you and all Enemies.

Ghastly Dream.NAME: Ghastly Dream
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn your Butterfly will be played an extra #b
times.

Dizziness.NAME: Dizziness
DESCRIPTIONS: Skip next turn of enemies.

Become Phantom.NAME: Become Phantom
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Phantom at the start of turn.

Float on Moon.NAME: Float on Moon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, UpgradeAll Butterfly for #b
times. Draw #b
cards fewer. NL Your Derivate Butterfly will Deal #b
times damage and exhaust

Supernatural Nether.NAME: Supernatural Nether
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of next #b
turns, increase Diaphaneity of everyone to 20.

Living to Die.NAME: Living to Die
DESCRIPTIONS: Diaphaneity of enemies will not reduce at turn start, NL When they reach 100 stacks of it, give 1 Intangible and 1 Fading.

Showy Withering.NAME: Showy Withering
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, UpgradeAll #b
times, Retrieve Sakura #b
times. NL Every third Sakura you play is exhausted.

Remain Here.NAME: Remain Here
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce #b10 Fan at end of each turn.

Full Inky Sakura.NAME: Full Inky Sakura
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a Sakura, NL next Butterfly will add an extra 5% MaxHP loss to all enemies.

The Forgotten Winter.NAME: The Forgotten Winter
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of next #b
turn, your Diaphaneity will not reduce.

Revive The Butterflies.NAME: Revive The Butterflies
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a non-derivate, Revive a Butterfly.

Postpone Bloom.NAME: Postpone Bloom
DESCRIPTIONS: Count when upgrading Sakura. NL At next shuffle, UpgradeAll Sakura for #b
times and draw #b
cards.

Prepare Triple Snow.NAME: Prepare-Triple Snow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, gain 'Triple Snow'.

Triple Snow.NAME: Triple Snow
DESCRIPTIONS: You will gain #b
times Diaphaneity from cards.

Reunion after Death.NAME: Reunion after Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
energy at the start of turn.

Chase The Sukhavati.NAME: Chase The Sukhavati
DESCRIPTIONS: End the turn after you play 10 cards

Past Graveyard.NAME: Reunion after Death
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, randomly give all targets 1~ #b
Diaphaneity.

Cerasus Subhirtella.NAME: Cerasus Subhirtella
DESCRIPTIONS: When drawing Sakura, Upgrade it for #b
times.

Trap Lamp.NAME: Trap Lamp

DESCRIPTIONS: When receiving damage, put Infinite into your hand.

Dancing Soul.NAME: Dancing Soul

Ticket to Heaven.NAME: Ticket to Heaven
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive extra #b
times damage from Constricted.

Prepare The Way to Death.NAME: Prepare-The Way to Death
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, gain 'The Way to Death'.

The Way to Death.NAME: The Way to Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Count the different costs you play each turn. Gain Phantom of their number at the start of next turn.

Prepare Dream of Spring.NAME: Prepare-Dream of Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, give all targets Dream of Spring.

Dream of Spring.NAME: Dream of Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive half damage, gain double heal.

Sakura Sakura.NAME: Sakura Sakura
DESCRIPTIONS: Place #ySakura into hand at the start of next #b
